headline: Colgate-Palmolive Webcasts Fireside Chat at the Fifth Annual Evercore ISI Consumer and Retail Conference
summary: NEW YORK, June 02, 2025--Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) President, Latin America, Juan Pablo Zamorano and Chief Investor Relations Officer and EVP, M&A, John Faucher will participate in a fireside chat at the Fifth Annual Evercore ISI Consumer and Retail Conference on Tuesday, June 10, 2025 at 1:00 p.m. ET.
